name: Alone. (Tetra-Bit)
description:
Dont you hate the feeling of being alone? Imagine being alone in an abandoned asylum with no memories at all and a missing psychotic patient on the loose . You need the escape your monsters and avoid the psychotic patient in order to redeem your freedom from your horrors. Solve the mysteries and learn about schizophrenia along the way . Can you escape your monsters , alone?

#alone #GALStudio #tetrabit #uitmlendu #minigameexhibition

  • TITLE: Alone.
  • GENRE: Horror , Adventure , Puzzle
  • EDUCATIONAL VALUE: Mental Health (Schizophrenia)
  • DEVELOPER: Gal Studios
  • PUBLISHED BY: Tetra-Bit

GAME CONTROLS

W/A/S/D - Move forward, Left , Backwards , Right

Spacebar - Jump

E - Open Door

Q - Collect Items

ESC/P - Pause Game
